data.name: Warface — Weapon set "Terrorist pack"
data.detailed_description:
About the "Terrorist" set


Weapons from the "Terrorists" set will easily deal with any enemy that stands in your way. The world’s most threatening rifle, coupled with a powerful automatic pistol, can become a force to be reckoned with in the right hands!



The set includes two types of weapons: a pistol, which is suitable for any class in the game (except for the SED) and a rifle for the Riflemen.

Glock 18

This is an excellent automatic pistol that will help you out when falling because of the impact of the shield-bearer’s punch in PvE. It makes it possible to fire both individual shots and several rounds. The ammunition is supplied via high-performance magazines that hold 33 cartridges.

АК-47

This is the most iconic assault rifle in the world as well as in the game. It is considered to be a versatile weapon that perfectly deals with any tasks assigned to it. It possesses optical sights, high damage and a fast reload speed which allows you to fight on both medium- and long-range.





After payment, the items will appear on your in-game account. Wait 15 minutes or restart the game if necessary.

data.short_description: The set includes two cool and powerful guns: an AK-47 rifle and a Glock 18 pistol. Unparalleled military classics at your fingertips!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Polish*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian*, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 415e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 250 GTS / Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 3470 / AMD Athlon 240GE
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
